title: Mother named as victim of Withernsea drowning, daughter still missing
description: A 67-year-old member of the public also died while trying to assist with the rescue, police previously confirmed.
content:
A mother has died and her daughter remains missing after getting into trouble in the sea off the East Yorkshire coast.
Humberside Police have said the body of Sarah Keeling, 45, was pulled from the water in Withernsea on Friday evening, adding that s... [1296 chars]

title: At least 30 killed and several others abducted as gunmen storm village in Nigeria
description: Police said the men stormed a village in Niger state on Saturday evening, opening fire on residents and destroying the local market and several houses.
content:
At least 30 people have been killed and several others abducted after gunmen attacked a village in Nigeria, police said.
The men stormed Kasuwan-Daji, in Niger state's Borgu area, and opened fire on residents on Saturday evening.
They also destroyed ... [1895 chars]

title: Igor Thiago hat-trick punishes sorry Everton as Brentford overtake them in table
description: Everton produced their worst performance of the season – and Brentford their best away from home – as the visitors won 4-2 to move up to seventh
content: Brentford’s previously dismal away form defies comprehension on this evidence. Keith Andrews’s team had the good fortune to encounter Everton’s worst performance of the season, admittedly, but with the rampant Igor Thiago capping a dominant display w... [3974 chars]

title: ‘The Glastonbury of sport’: Luke Littler effect takes darts to new heights
description: A peak audience of 2.5m watched the world championship final on Sky as Luke Litter defended his title
content: If further proof was needed about the burgeoning popularity of Luke Littler and darts, it came with early viewing figures from Barb that showed the 18-year-old’s second world title victory on Saturday night was watched by a peak audience of 2.5m on S... [4352 chars]

title: Scots band frontman dies in Hogmanay hillwalking tragedy one day after birthday
description: Dad-of-two Andrew Ure, 41, was found dead on Ben Vane after going missing during a solo hike.
content:
Dad-of-two Andrew Ure, 41, was found dead on Ben Vane after going missing during a solo hike.
A tragic hillwalker died suddenly on a mountainside on Hogmanay - a day after celebrating his 41st birthday. Father-of-two Andrew Ure was lead singer of Fal... [3087 chars]
